title: (x) Arte�S� - lazer e cultura - Barbedor {Mark S}
content:
Can anyone help me in this one? It looks familiar but I can�t identify. Thanks.   
||jmendes||   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054705im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68961.jpg)
author: jmendesign

comments.content: The large type is [Barbedor Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/barbedor/ef-black-italic/testdrive.html?s=Arte+Sa&p=48) I think. Not sure about the smaller type. Looks a bit like El Greco or Cateneo, but not exactly like either.

\> Thanks...   
   
\> Cataneu [from Bitstream I think!] is not quiet the same... different l! Any more ideas?   
   
Thanks again!
Mark, don't you think the small type is [Barbedor](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/barbedor/ef-black-italic/testdrive.html?s=lazer+e+cultura&p=36) too?

[Could be](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/barbedor/ef-medium-italic/testdrive.html?s=lazer+e+cultura&p=48), but some of the details don't seem to match. On the other hand, it may just be some kind of distortion in the reproduction.
\> The Z don't seem to match! But I think is very close to Barbedor too. Thanks everyone again! ||jmendes||
